replies.author: cr244028500
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
908156267 发表于 2011-8-25 15:55 
下载哪个？怎么装？求教
網頁不是都有說嗎?? 又看不懂英文???

Alpha download Java 6 (recommended, version 2)

Instructions:
1. copy the files from Minecraft folder to the minecraft.jar
2. copy the '/shader' folder to your '/bin' folder
3. delete the '/meta_inf' folder in your minecraft.jar

well 发表于 2011-8-25 16:54 
網頁不是都有說嗎?? 又看不懂英文???
